While the bubbly is all well and good, it would just be nice to have flights without problems. A day ahead of my three flights to England you said my first flight was delayed by 2 hours. How is it ALREADY delayed? It’s the day before. The delay would make me miss my subsequent flights. I contacted customer service and was on the call for almost 4 hours. Then the agent was gone and I wasn’t sure if I was booked or not. So I checked the app and I have a new booking with a 7 hour layover in Seattle (thanks for that) and have been downgraded from premium to the back of the planes. I fly Delta Air Lines internationally twice a year, and they either lose my luggage or bump me off flights or leave me stranded in airports for 24 hours because they can’t get connections right. Today was just too much for me. This airline doesn’t care about its passengers, and doesn’t compensate them for the blunders they make or even honor the upgrades they pay for. I’ve been stupid to keep hoping my next experience with them will be a good one and that’s my own fault, but lesson learned this time. What a disappointing airline.
I’d rather have lower airfare. Flying round trip to Bahamas is ridiculous . $1500.00
I’ll be taking a little time out, driving my converted sprinter van and taking the Train for a while, probably at least two years.

Unfortunately, my peace and opportunity for a break and a stress free few days has turned into an actual nightmare. Our flights got delayed. Our connections were missed, and instead of having sympathy or care for our situation the first two Delta agents we had to speak to literally yelled at us and told us there was nothing they could do to help us because the only flights available for four days were first class and under no circumstances do they offer rebookings as upgrades. They shooed us away to go pick up a desk phone to “get someone else to help” because there was nothing onsite Delta agents could do. We LITERALLY had to sit in the cold, depressing customer service lounge on the phone for four hours to find an option. The BEST option we were given was to take 5 flights to eventually reach our destination. I’m optimistic so I agreed. After two days of travel we arrived despite being humiliated that our connecting flights sky club lounge doesn’t accept stamped boarding passes any longer to honor 24 hour access. Then we arrived to our destination only to find that we will spend ANOTHER day without our clothes.
Thank you for contacting our customer service. In response to your query, can you provide more details about your request? Kindly share your complaint, full names, email address, and phone number.
